result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: 1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 12

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Titus Tyra Jr.

defendant.name: Tyra, Christopher Titus, Jr.
defendant.address: 5214 North Lovers Lane Road #5, Milwaukee, WI 53225

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Christopher Titus Tyra Jr. in court in person, in custody.  Attorney Jack T Eichorst on behalf of Attorney Alicia H Kort in court in person for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for Status of Counsel. Defendant appears without representation. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court orders a new date be set to give SPD more time. Matter is adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
No Contact Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Christopher Titus Tyra Jr. in court, in custody.  Attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs in court with Christopher Titus Tyra Jr.  Attorney Alicia H Kort in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Matter in court for Doctors report return.

The defendant is requesting new counsel.  Court GRANTS the request.

Doctor's report received and filed.  Parties reviewed report and do not contest findings.  Court found defendant competent to proceed and reinstated proceedings.  Arguments heard as to bail.   State request bail be set at $50,000.00.  The defendant request a low case bail.  Court orders bail set at $30,000.00, with TURN OVER TO JUSTICEPOINT, for level 5 monitoring, GPS, 24hour curfew, No contact with the victim or the victim' s family.
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Christopher Titus Tyra Jr. in court, in custody.  Attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs in court with Christopher Titus Tyra Jr.  Attorney Ken Olstinski for Alicia H Kort in court for State of Wisconsin. 

The court is in receipt of the Doctor's report.
The examiner was not able to issue a finding a competent or not competent.  Court orders the defendant to be reexamined at an inpatient facility.

Case adjourned for Doctor's Report Return.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Letter from defendant.  (Christopher T. Tyra, Jr. - #2022007274, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Forensic evaluation ordered.  INITIAL APPEARANCE NOT HELD.  Trial court to address INITIAL APPEARANCE.

Defendant Christopher Titus Tyra in court with attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs.  Defendant Christopher Titus Tyra in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Christopher Titus Tyra appeared by video means with Attorney.   Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.  Defendant has lower number case pending. Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Brostrom, Branch 6.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into custody of Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Commissioner tolls the time limits for the preliminary hearing.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
